column4: how can i ssh into another local computer? it says ssh is refused.
are you running an ssh server on the other computer?
ssh server?!
i wanna know how can i enable ssh login in ubuntu.
okkkkkk :|
it's easy, don't worry :)
btw how can i share files between two lan connected ubuntu machine?
you can use ssh to do that too
i have some experience with ssh and scp, but i could not think they did not install it by default! :o
they don't on ubuntu, because most people will never use it.  ssh client is installed by default, however.
also, it opens [possible] security holes running a server most people won't use
hmmm.
and it's easy to install: sudo apt-get install openssh
openssh-server
or something like that :)
yeah. i got it. thnx for your help. :)
great :)
!ask

one more question. can anyone tell me about pulse audio's networking concepts? my friend has a nice speaker. i wanna share it. so i installed pulseaudio properly. then lot's of server, source, sink thing... :( i dont get them.
pulse will be default in next version but that probably doesn't help you much :)
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PulseAudio ?
yeah during lots of source sink combination, it actually worked once!!:-/ but i can not recreate it.
